TAUNT.szText: Say hello to my lil' friend!
Send me a postcard from HELL!
You'll be six feet under in no time!
Gonna send ya home in a pine box, loser!
You should have stayed home, bitch!
You should have stayed home, fucker!
Guns don't kill people, I do!
Come on! I don't got all day!
You fucked with the wrong man!
You fucked with the wrong woman!
Die in fire, son of a bitch!
I got a present for ya!
You should see your face now!
I always wanted to do this.
Now I remember why I joined army!
I'll stomp on your head till you're dead!
I'll rip you fucking legs out of your ass!
Welcome to world of pain. I'll be your guide!
I'll slice ya up like a mango!
Ready or not, here I come!
You and me! No rules! Come on, coward!
You don't leave me a choice!
I'll stab you until you say "ouch, I'm dead"!
It's Christmas! And you've been VERY naughty!
I warn you! I watched "Enter the Dragon" TWICE!
I promise it won't hurt... much.
Shit, I can't believe I'm doing this!
Here's a token of my gratitude!
Have more where it came from!
Attention, everyone! We've got possible contact!
Listen everyone, there's some wierd shit going on.
Can someone check out these noises?
Possible contact! Oh, I hope it's them. I didn't kill anything in a long time.
Let me guess, another false alarm.
I've waited for this looong time.
Sucker with the lowest body count buys drinks!
They have no idea what they are in for...
I call dibs on any rocket launchers we loot from corpses!
Oh, I can't wait to get my hands on them!
Finally, my training will pay off.
Now I'll be able to prove myself.
Can't guy get a nap around here?
I'm totally gonna desert as soon as we start losing.
"Surely they wouldn't dare to attack you." Riiight.
Thanks for turning my shitty day into complete disaster, assholes!
Everybody stay calm, and we will make it through.
I hoped this would never happen...
It was bound to happen eventually.
I warn you... my detection skills are at their PEAK!
Hey! Who's making all that racket?
Just show yourself, wherever you are!
Can someone else check it out, please?
It was just a wind... wait a sec, there's no wind!
Show yourself! We're friendly... and don't know how to fight.
I spy with my little eye!
It was all part of my plan!
They ain't paying us enough for this shit...
When did things go so wrong?
You'll pay for that... the other day!
Don't think you I will forgive ya!
I'll be back when you least expect me, fucker!
I'll leave you alive... for now.
Screw this! I'm not even a real soldier!
They said "join the army". Not for this shit!
Screw you guys, I'm going home!
I, ehrm, left the lights on in my place. Gotta go!
Leave me your phone number, and I'll get back to ya!
You fucked with the wrong guy!
Now you have... pissed me off.
Pain is just a weakness leaving my body!
Who do you think you are?
This hurts you more then it hurts me.
Hey, Cordona! Queen Dee Dee says hi!
I'll get promotion me for killing you, rebel scum!
Holy shit, it's Gus Tarballs! We're fucked!
Hey, it's a guy from "Wild, Wild East"! I'm your biggest fan!
Bang-bang! Just like in "Attack of the Clydesdales"!
Get back on your Honda, and travel away!
Forgive me, for I have sinned!
Father, what about the fifth commandment? You hypocrite!
Get back to your grave, you freakin' zombie!
Enemy detected! Damn, he's hard to miss...
I'm doing world a favor getting rid of your ugly face!
Hey babe, give me your number, and I'll stop shooting!
Hey handsome, give me your number, and I'll stop shooting!
Aren't you a bit old for this, geezer?
Don't make me go over there!
You've just made a big mistake!
I'll take that gun out of your cold hands!
That shot was bad and you should feel bad!
Oh, don't let the disappointment get to you.
Get back in the kitchen, where you belong, woman!
Dead or alive, you're coming with me.
I kick ass for the queen!
I looked for you, I found you and now I will kill you!
Somebody's gonna get hurt. It ain't gonna be me!
Is that the best you can do?
Very pretty, but can you fight?
I deliver justice... one bullet at a time!
Keep a place in hell for your queen!
Shit, for a moment I thought I threw a pin...
We're in some real pretty shit now!
It is no dream! This is really happening!
I got a bad feeling on this one.
Why this shit always happens to me!?
I can't deal with this anymore
What the hell am I going to do now?
I should get the hell out of here!
Oh no, how could this happen?
I will not fight those bastards alone!
I'll carve ya up like a chicken!
I can't believe they're paying me for that!
You know what would nice right now? Fava beans and a glass of chianti!
I'll gut you like a fish!
Let's see what's inside this pinata!
When I'm finished with you, you'll sing soprano!
There's a mustard on your shirt!
Nice ears, Jumbo! They'll look fine on my necklace!
I'll break your every single bone!
Normally I wouldn't hit a woman... oh, who am I kidding!
Time to loot a corpse, I guess.
You OK? You look kinda... dead!
You could at least TRY to die with some dignity.
That door revolved one time too many...
Rot in hell, you backstabbing bastard.
Take a hike, Mike! Damn, that sounded better in my head.
I'll give you my autograph Gillitt... in the condolence book!
I knew I was better than you, Gillitt!
I just whacked Miguel Cordona! Finally, Queen will hear about me!
Let this be a lesson for all of you!
Oh, Foxy. I didn't even have a time to read you my poem....
In the name of all male population around the globe: we're going to miss you.
Oh, too bad. She was kinda cute.
OK, I think it's pretty safe to assume he's dead.
OK, I think it's pretty safe to assume she's dead.
It didn't have end up like this.!
I think I'll skip a lunch today.
Fuck yeah! I love this job!
It's OK, you weren't using it anyway.
I warned you about mexican food!
What can I say, I'm a better draw.
Ashes to ashes, dust to dust.
Holy shit! Kill it before it breeds!
No offense lady, but I wouldn't touch you with a stick!
Next time try shooting with open eyes!
Stop shaking! I can't hit you!
Shit, Lynx! I wanted to hang your head over the chimney!
And I've made contact with you! Prepare to die!
I don't know, maybe I'll send them my CV after I kill you!
PX? What the fuck does it even mean?
It will be one-way trip for you!
Oh yes, by all means! Move out in the open!
Luck is for wusses, real professionals depend on their skill!
What? I can SEE you and HEAR you, you moron!
Yeah, and don't even think about a lunch break!
I'm sorry, didn't catch the name!
Doesn't matter, you'll be dead soon enough.
So THAT'S why she didn't get my postcard.
You know there's no such animal, right?
Not yet. But soon you'll meet him!
Just wait, and this trouble will run into YOU!.
Scoundrel? I'll make you eat those words!
Will see who's about to teach whom!
Did you just call me an ass!?
I didn't understand a single word!
I'm not really evil... just misunderstood.
You're the disease and I'm the cure.
I'm gonna blow your head off!
Jerk on this you cocky shit licker!
I eat Green Berets for breakfast!
I'm going to cut out your living guts!
Here is your freedom you son of a bitch!
Dying ain't much of a living, boy!
Dying ain't much of a living, girl!
Is that the best you can do?
Very pretty, but can you fight?
I deliver justice... one bullet at a time!
Shit, for a moment I thought I threw a pin...
It's about to turn into full tournee!
I'll dig you one! Six feet under!
I guess there's no more room in hell...
Is this some kind of a joke?
Great, that's exactly what this country needs. A fucking zombie apocalypse!
Remember, shoot the head, shoot the head...
Come for me! Come on, you rotting corpse!
I'll send you back to hell!
Oh shit! It can smell my brain!
Is this running one or walking one? I'm confused...
Nothing's ever real until it's real.
There must be some rational explanation. Virus, space radiation, maybe a meteor...
I will not negotiate with undead!
So there IS a life after death!
Fuck, I think I forgot to take my pills.
That's it, no more drugs for me.
I knew that movie was based on a true story!
Fuck global warming, we've got real problems here!
Come on! It wasn't even 17 seconds!
At a certain point in your life you realize you know more dead people than living.
It's amazing how fast the world can go from bad to total shit storm.
It could be worse. They could be nazi!
Where's my lawnmower when I need it?
It's againt the nature, you freak!
Hmmm... I bet I would make a cool zombie myself.
No! I don't want to become one of you!
Stay away from my precious gray matter!
Please, don't eat me! I'm fat and have too much sugar in my blood!
Aaaah! Should I cut it off now?!
They're gonna eat me! Oh my GOOOOOOD!
Not my face! My beautiful face!
Suddenly, I'm getting a real hankering for brains!
Does it hurt to be dead?
If it's stands up again, I'm gonna shit myself.
Get back where you came from!
I'll squash you like a bug!
My God, you're so ugly, you could be a modern-art masterpiece!
Hey babe, I'll drive you crazy even without a driver's license!
OK, go fetch the rest of the team... I'll wait!
Watch out, the lightning may strike... Oh, it just did!
Are you always this stupid or is it a special occasion?
Look what you've made me do...
Struggle is the enemy, but lead is the remedy!
Cause of death: acute lead poisoning!
Look who's come to the picnic!
You've got to be crazy to come here!
You're so cute when you're trying to shoot!
You're so cute when you're trying to shoot!
Hey babe, you should have known how to please me by now...
Blast it! You've spent so much bullets, you've got me confused!
How about that? I've got a superpower and I didn't even know about it - I can dodge bullets!
You think shooting me is gonna solve your problems?
Oh, I'm laughing at your superior skills!
Aw, come on, why so serious? Can't you take a joke?
I'm not angry! You will know when I'm angry!
Let's not make a big deal out of nothing!
Are you trying to piss me off?
Do you want to hurt me on purpose?
Oh I'd love to smack you right now!
I'm going to beat the crap out of you!
If you shoot me again, I'm going to wrap your gun around your neck!
I'll punch you, I'll stab you, I'll strangle you! You know... that's what friends do!
Hey lads, this one's in pains, we should put an end to his misery!
God will find a way to get you back, and it ain't gonna be pretty.
The army... I should have known better!
Coming here... What was I thinking?
I can't believe I've came here with such idiots.
No weapons! No friends! No hope!
If it were up to me, I would have never joined the army, but my mom had to force me...
HELP! I've run into an unstoppable monster!
Hey guys, I think this one's pregnant!
Are you lost? The auditions for "Free Willy" are that way!
This one's delusional - he thinks he's a killer whale!
How appropriate, you fight like a big fat cow!
Hey honey, what are you doing here? You couldn't handle the washing machine?
It must be this time of the month!
Damn, does this chick have PMS too? Because it looks like she already has mad cow disease!
Look guys, dinosaurs are still alive!
Look guys, dinosaurs are still alive!
Look guys, dinosaurs are still alive!
Are you trying to shoot me or did your gun just fart?
Are you trying to shoot me or did your gun just fart?
Don't ever stop trying, who knows, maybe a miracle will happen!
Try again, honey! No pressure. No judgment. I'm here!
Try again, honey! No pressure. No judgment. I'm here!
OK, keep shooting, I'll yawn when you hit something!
Excellence is not a skill. It's an attitude.
You spread bullets the same way you spread your legs...
You and your gun.. BANG! BANG! What the fuck, are you tryin' to bang everyone?
Poor thing! He's bleeding.. Hold on, I'll find you a tampon.
Oh, poor thing ... she broke her nails!
You look tired, maybe we should put you to sleep... permanently!
I see you and now I can see through you!
Wow, you're even dumber than you look.
You remind me of a younger, dumber Schwarzenegger!
Now, we know that we aren't all that cute, but what the fuck happened to you?
I could apply you a make up with a shotgun, and you'd still look better!
Wow! Who let the gorilla out of the cage?
Holy shit, they brought in transvestites!
Girl, with that hair...you must be a saint - saint Bernard!
Did you noticed how "awesome" ends with "me", and "ugly" starts with "u"?
As an outsider, what do you think of the human race?
You remind me of my Chinese friend Ug Lee!
Well, if it ain't my favorite porn star!
You know, I could slap you right now, but I don't want a slut on my hand!
It was about time for a magic trick... Bam, he's gone!
How about a date - just you, me and a roll of duct tape?
How about a date - just you, me and a roll of duct tape?
Are you tryin' to make me look good?
Hey, stop shooting! I'm on the phone with my mom!
Ouch, I'm hit, I'm hit... No, just kiddin'!
Guys, what should we do with this one, shoot him or starve him to death?
Guys, what should we do with this one, shoot her or starve her to death?
Hey boy, what do you have in that backpack? Sandwiches?
Hey girl, what do you have in that backpack? Sandwiches?
You fight so badly you make even the onions cry.
I guess the only fan you have is on the ceiling.
How's that karma tasting? Not so good?
Do you always take yourself so seriously?
Because of you, they put the word failure in the dictionary.
Go bore someone else with your existence.
When I saw your sister for the first time I thought she's the ugliest creature on earth, well, I was mistaken!
Look at me, now back at you, now back to me... Do you still think you are cool?
Look at me, now back at you, now back to me... Do you still think you are cool?
Everyone deserves a happy ending, except you!
Wait till my brother hears about this, he's gonna kick your ass!
Oh my god, my heart almost stopped beauting!
Gee, that gave me goose bumps!
Sometimes the road less traveled is less traveled for a reason!
OK, that was the last straw!
If I throw a stick, will you go away?
How can I miss you if you won't go away?
Hold my beer and watch this!
Oh my God, look at you. Anyone else hurt in the accident?
Oh my God, look at you. Anyone else hurt in the accident?
I thought your purpose was to die!
Hey clown, have you came here to amuse me?
Are you a parking ticket? 'Cause you've got fine written all over you!
Yo Pops, are you the one who invented electricity?
Nice wig honey, what's it made of? Your mom's chest hair?
Excuse me is that your nose, or did a bus park on your face?
Did your parents have any children that lived?
You are a sad strange little man, and you have my pity!
Never seen so many backwards ass country fucks in my life.
Frankly, my dear, I don't give a damn!
If I had a dick, this is where I would tell you to suck it!
That's what I thought. You're a gutless turd!
What? Hello? I can't hear anything!
Suddenly all went quiet. What the hell?
Holy shit, priest was right! It DOES make you blind!
Somebody help me! I can't see!
You think I won't get you 'cause I'm blind? I can smell your stench!
Everyone, throw whatever you're doing and help me!
